info.name: Alterra Bills
info.description:
**Alterra Bills** is a Postman Collection that help 3rd Party to create and update invoice and also register payment dynamically.

## QuickStart

Before you run the API, you need to :

1. Create an environment with "url" as variable. For the value you can fill an url that has any Alterra Bills API.
2. Send the **Auth** request to get the session_id that stored in cookies.
3. Session_id from all Request except **auth** and **destroy** will be detected automatically by Odoo API if no **X-Openerp-Session-Id** value on the headers of the request.
4. To finish the session, you can use **Destroy** request to erase the cookies.

request.description:
It's use to get session_id to access all of the API. This request needed to be the first request before the other request.

#### Requirements :
**No changing** needed to this request body and headers.

response.name: Auth

request.description:
It's use to erase the session_id to end the session. This reuest needed to be the last request before the other request.

#### Requirements :
**No changing** needed to this request body and headers.

It's use to get session_id to access all of the API. This request needed to be the first request before the other request.

#### Requirements :
**No changing** needed to this request body and headers.
